aboutMeData.name: Anastasiia Yaitska
aboutMeData.title: Hello! I'm Anastasiia Yaitska
aboutMeData.body: A highly motivated and enthusiastic front-end developer with a strong passion for solving problems with code and creating engaging and user-friendly web applications. Despite embarking on my web development journey just a year ago, I have made remarkable strides in honing my skills. My toolkit includes proficiency in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and modern frontend frameworks such as Nextjs and React. With a commitment to continuous learning, I am dedicated to staying up-to-date with industry trends and best practices.
aboutMeData.body2: As a beginner, I am constantly seeking new challenges and projects to work on, collaborate with others, and I believe that working on projects is the best way to learn and grow as a developer. I completed comprehensive web development training through HackYourFuture's curriculum. This training provided me with expertise in various technologies, including HTML, CSS, responsive web design, JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Node.js, Express.js, and databases. I am well-versed in version control using Git and project management using Jira.
aboutMeData.body3: When I am not coding, I enjoy spending time with my family and friends. In love with the mountains and nature.I also try to develop along with new technologies, so I decided to be a volunteer at GoTo Aarhus software conferences.

ContactMe.title: Hello there!
ContactMe.body: Thank you for considering my profile. I am eager for the chance to contribute my skills to a dynamic and collaborative team as a junior frontend developer.
